string1: We believe that every person with chronic conditions needs a trusted voice empowering them to achieve their micro-goals, every step of the way throughout their health journey.
string2: We believe that health ecosystem players can only achieve the true potential of remote healthcare when they maintain continuous relationships with every patient, to independently comply with their unique health programs, at scale.
string3: Sweetch Health brings together experts from the fields of behavioral science, data science, artificial intelligence (AI), user experience, and product innovation in order to significantly impact the health of millions around the globe.
